verses.1: Hong pai un, Topa phat ni. Eite a hong hu, a hong hon khia pa tungah lungdamna la sa ni.
verses.2: Ama omna ah lungdamna ko-in pai ni. Phatna late, ama tungah lungdam takin sa ni.
verses.3: Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa, a lian Pasian hi a, pasian khempeuh tungah Kumpi lianpa ahi hi.
verses.4: Amah in leitung khempeuh uk a, guam thuk pen panin mual sang pen dawn dongin amah in a uk hi.
verses.5: Ama bawl sa tuipite uk a, ama bawl sa leitung zong amah in a uk hi.
verses.6: Hong pai un, amah bia-in kun ni. Eite hong Bawl Topaʼ mai ah khukdin ni.
verses.7: Bang hang hiam cih leh amah pen eiteʼ Pasian hi a, eite pen ama hong kep mite le ama khut sunga om a tuute ihi hi. Tu ni-in hih bangin ama hong thugen za un:
verses.8: Amaute in ka nasepna mu khin uh hi napi, Meribah le Massah munah na pate un kei hong ze-etin, gamtatna tawh ka lah ding hong kalh hun lai uh bangin, note in na lungsim uh khauhsak kei un.
verses.10: Kum sawm li sung tua minam ka kih a, “Amaute pen a lungsim uh ah a khial mi hi a, amaute in ka thupiakte mang lo uh hi,” ka ci hi.
verses.11: Tua ahih ciangin keima nopsakna munah amaute a lut lo dingin sin so kawmin ka kiciam hi.
